data.description: www.semi.org Sesc2 stringify of nested data
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This submissions changes the name of the 'Data::Strify' module
    submission to 'Data::Secs2'. There are some justified questions
    about how well the 'Data::Strify' name fits the module per the below
    remark.

    > > modid: Data::Strify > > description: stringify nested data >
    Data::StringifyNested seems much more self explanatory. > Tim Bruce.

    The new name is very self expanatory to the Semi crowd.
